[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9970df2d4207425a8c079da996ecf688" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]It's no use. We have to retreat!

WaveMain.Story_Announce_IdleTalk_14: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="847f3657788b4bd99a20d6653d205dea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="STAB" scale="0.66"/] to see the daily [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Status Report[System:Color name="Default"].
